name: finance
author: johnsonfung
description: Personal finance calculations for loans, mortgages, investments, FIRE planning, and more

commands.name: loan
commands.description: Calculate loan payment, total interest, and amortization schedule

commands.name: mortgage
commands.description: Calculate mortgage payment, total interest, and amortization schedule

commands.name: investment
commands.description: Calculate investment growth with contributions, taxes, and inflation

commands.name: fire_amount
commands.description: Calculate annual income from investments using safe withdrawal rate

commands.name: fire_plan
commands.description: Calculate path to financial independence and retirement timeline

commands.name: pv
commands.description: Calculate present value of a future amount

commands.name: fv_simple
commands.description: Calculate future value of a present amount (simple calculation)

commands.name: pmt
commands.description: Calculate payment per period (Excel PMT function)

commands.name: npv
commands.description: Calculate net present value from cash flows (Excel NPV function)

commands.name: irr
commands.description: Calculate internal rate of return from cash flows (Excel IRR function)

commands.name: tax
commands.description: Calculate tax amount and after-tax income
